For example, we share data with your email and calendar provider, such as Google or Microsoft.
No one under age 18 may provide any information to or on the Websites, directly use the Boomerang Services, or install the Boomerang Apps.
We collect: information about events in your calendar, such as event titles, attendees, locations, and meeting times.
With your consent, we may also use your information to contact you about our own services that may be of interest to you, such as newsletters and other promotional material.

However, we may disclose aggregated information about our users, and information that does not identify any individual, without restriction.
We also occasionally collect non-personal, aggregated data as you use Boomerang, so we can build useful new things.
We also may use automated data collection technologies to collect information about your online activities over time and across third-party websites or other online services (behavioral tracking).
Baydin will retain your Communications for only as long as necessary to provide you with the Services and we will retain your Personal Data for the entire time that you keep your account open.

After retention of your Communications is no longer necessary and after you close your account, we may retain your Communications or Personal Data, as applicable:
For example, if you give us an email address to use the "Send Later" feature of the Boomerang Services, we will store your Communications on our servers and transmit the contents of that email and your email address to the recipients after the time you specify;
We collect: the contents and header information from the Communications you send and receive through the service.

For example, if you give us an email address to use the "Send Later" feature of the Boomerang Services, we will store your Communications on our servers and transmit the contents of that email and your email address to the recipients after the time you specify;
This information is used to provide you with the Boomerang Service and allows us to analyze the content of your email to get more responses, strike the right tone, and get insights into your writing style as well as schedule meetings, share your availability with others, hold (pause) emails until you are ready to review them, schedule emails for later delivery, add read receipts to your outgoing emails, get notifications if someone doesn't respond to your email, and enhance your email productivity in various other ways.

We collect: details of your visits to our Websites or use of the Boomerang Apps, specifically traffic data, location data, logs, referring/exit pages, date and time of your visit to our Websites or use of the Boomerang Apps, error information, clickstream data, and other communication data and the resources that you access and use on the Websites;

This geolocation data is stored locally on your mobile device, processed locally by the Boomerang App, and not otherwise transmitted to us.
We also use your geolocation data to snooze certain Communications that you request until you arrive at the location you specify.

Generally

When you register to use the Boomerang Services or use our Websites, we collect several types of information from and about users of the Boomerang Services, specifically information: that is about you but individually does not identify you, such as traffic data, location data, logs, referring/exit pages, date and time of your visit to our Websites, error information, clickstream data, and other communication data and the resources that you access and use on the Websites; and/or
We also use your geolocation data to snooze certain Communications that you request until you arrive at the location you specify.
We collect: details of your visits to our Websites or use of the Boomerang Apps, specifically traffic data, location data, logs, referring/exit pages, date and time of your visit to our Websites or use of the Boomerang Apps, error information, clickstream data, and other communication data and the resources that you access and use on the Websites;
We collect: geolocation data from your mobile device, if you have enabled this feature.

Generally

When you register to use the Boomerang Services or use our Websites, we collect several types of information from and about users of the Boomerang Services, specifically information: by which you may be personally identified, such as name, postal address, email address, telephone number any other identifier by which you may be contacted online or offline ("Personal Data");
As you use the Boomerang Services, we may collect certain information about your Communications.

As you navigate through and interact with our Websites or use the Boomerang Services, we may use automatic data collection technologies to collect certain information about your equipment, browsing actions, and patterns.
We will only use information that we collect or you provide to deliver advertisements according to our advertisers' target-audience preferences with your express consent.
We also may use automated data collection technologies to collect information about your online activities over time and across third-party websites or other online services (behavioral tracking).

We collect: Information about your computer, mobile device, and internet connection, email or calendar client, specifically your IP address, mobile device make and model, operating system, and browser type.

However, we may disclose aggregated information about our users, and information that does not identify any individual, without restriction.
We also occasionally collect non-personal, aggregated data as you use Boomerang, so we can build useful new things.
We also use aggregated, anonymized records of non-personal information that we collect about you or that you provide to us as part of your usage of the Service in order to develop and train algorithms that allow us build new features of the Service.

Generally

When you register to use the Boomerang Services or use our Websites, we collect several types of information from and about users of the Boomerang Services, specifically information: by which you may be personally identified, such as name, postal address, email address, telephone number any other identifier by which you may be contacted online or offline ("Personal Data");
We may process your Personal Data in Communications with automated decision making processes.

We collect: responses from the recipients of your Communications, if you have enabled this feature.

We collect: store information about your preferences, allowing us to customize our Websites and the Boomerang Apps according to your individual interests;

When you use the Boomerang Service, we may also collect and process these types of information when you compose an email or meeting invite, send your calendar information, and when you hold or pause messages in your inbox or schedule communications for later, include a read receipt, request notification if a user doesn't respond, or otherwise use features provided by the Service.
